title: Rama Series Ebooks 1-6 Retail ePub/Mobi - Arthur Clarke - Gentry
description: Retail versions (.ePub and .Mobi) of the Arthur C. Clarke and Gentry Lee "Rama" series. Included are Rendezvous with Rama, Rama II, Garden of Rama, Rama Revealed, and the two Lee novels Bright Messengers and Double Full Moon Night set in the Rama universe. Unlike other copies out there, these are retail versions and are properly formatted and will scale and flow correctly on any .ePub or .Mobicompatible reading device. Thanks
